idea:
TARANA STUDIOS (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED  provide creative services in the entertainment and media industry. Our main work is Audio Production ( Songs, background scores for films, jingles, producing artists etc ) & Video Production

 ( Mainly we want to stick with music videos at this moment but in future we would like to expand to film also ). At this initial stage we are only focusing on making songs and producing maximum artists to liberate them and make them self sufficient as an artist. Our clients include movies & Media Production Houses, Educational institutions, Publishers, Telecom, Sales Agencies, and various foreign radio stations. Ideas that stem from various lifelong influences are arranged in an attempt to put together a blend of larger than life outcomes and utmost customer satisfaction.
name: TARANA STUDIOS (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: LABSTAR MULTIPLAST PRIVATE LIMITED s a renowned name in the field of plastic laboratory disposables. Labstar  Multiplast has left no stone unturned in the competitive lab disposable landscape. Our quality assured products are manufactured by our expert professionals using high quality raw material sourced from our reliable vendors in the market. Our diligent team of professionals’ work earnestly and passionately in close co-ordination with each other to deliver excellent quality products. Owing to this, we have been able to muster a huge client base. In addition to this, we are now spreading our wings across the vastly advanced international market. We are already catering to international requirements and are exporting globally.
name: LABSTAR MULTIPLAST PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: A corporate  wellness firm, catering all aspects of wellness in a holistic approach.
name: Wellsure India

idea:
Kal Hans symbolizes transformation. We use 100% all natural, vegan ingredients and embolden our customers to be curious, whilst arming them with the knowledge to make the right decisions when it comes to their skin.


Our philosophy centers around the continual betterment, growth and confidence in one’s own skin as opposed to striving for unrealistic standards of beauty- Because what makes you different makes you UNIQUE. We are a brand that celebrates our flaws and idiosyncrasies, providing you with the most beautiful, efficacious and nutrient rich ingredients, to guide you on the path to becoming your best self. 


Knowing full well that our actions effect the planet it was also important to us to create a label that could both positively influence our customers and our environment. In an effort to do so, we make eco friendly, sustainable choices that minimize our environmental impact, from our packaging to our ingredients. Our aim is simple: To give you the best natural skincare out there that is great for you and for the planet.
name: Kal Hans Naturals

idea: Conducting Hydrological and GPS Surveys, Designing, Consultation and Execution of Rain Water Harvesting and Ground Water Management Projects. Supply of water conservation products.
name: WATER FIELD TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Introduction TeachersHelpTeachers started with Facebook group in the year 2015 with 600 members. The group is exclusively for educators to share/ learn and support other fellow educators, thus being together the teaching community and helping evolve solution to problems in education.


In the age of Digitalisation where for every problem there is an app. THT is a one stop solution for teachers. This platform enables the teacher member to learn from other fellow teachers across the country as well as provides various employment opportunities. THT is all set to become the one-stop destination for all individuals working in the field of Indian education.
name: TeachersHelpTeachers Pvt Ltd

idea: CG Bugs Studio is an Animation Company Based in Mumbai, Maharashtra. The Studio Provide Services in the 2D Animation, 3D Animation, Whiteboard Animation, Product Videos, Branding Videos, Typography Animation TVCs, Customer Education Videos, Live Shoot, Films, Visual Effects and Games Industries. It was founded in 2021 by CG bugs group.
name: CGBUGS LLP
